scenario_name: Model Inversion Attack on Customer Credit Scoring Model
description: A malicious actor attempts to reconstruct a sensitive customer credit scoring model through a series of carefully crafted queries to a public-facing API.  The goal is to reverse engineer the model's internal logic and gain an unfair advantage in credit applications or fraudulent activities.
initial_goal: Assess the accuracy of the credit scoring model by submitting various synthetic customer profiles and analyzing the output.
enterprise_context: Consumer banking: A credit scoring model used by a large bank to assess loan applications is vulnerable to model inversion attacks via its publicly accessible API. The attacker is a competitor attempting to gain an unfair advantage.
